analysis.description:
Forwarder.flush (/unique_chucks/2/0xccf6450724e3271a62f1fa751a381fb3c58e68f2.sol#77-82) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! parentAddress.call.value(this.balance)() (/unique_chucks/2/0xccf6450724e3271a62f1fa751a381fb3c58e68f2.sol#82)

Forwarder.flushTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xccf6450724e3271a62f1fa751a381fb3c58e68f2.sol#58-72) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- forwarderBalance == 0

WalletSimple.verifyMultiSig (/unique_chucks/2/0xccf6450724e3271a62f1fa751a381fb3c58e68f2.sol#234-269) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- expireTime < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/2/0xccf6450724e3271a62f1fa751a381fb3c58e68f2.sol#249-250)

WalletSimple.recoverAddressFromSignature uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0xccf6450724e3271a62f1fa751a381fb3c58e68f2.sol#296-312)
	- /unique_chucks/2/0xccf6450724e3271a62f1fa751a381fb3c58e68f2.sol#305-309
